amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 118-12 to include a findings section and sense of Congress regarding public education and rights that parents have access to in public schools. To include titles creating a parent coordinator position in public schools, increasing the authorization level for Full-Service Community Schools, increasing the authorization level for Statewide Family Engagement Centers, and to establish rules of construction prohibiting the banning of books or certain curricular materials.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to make tangible investments in parental involvement regarding public education and rights that parents have access to in public schools.
